entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as someone who needs to be cheered up by Hermione. He is also shown to be worried about Harry seeing a Grim.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as someone who tries to cheer up Ron and calm him down when he gets angry.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as a source of information that Hermione refers to in order to try to calm Ron down.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who has seen a Grim and is not aware of the significance of this event.

entities.name: bilius
entities.description: Bilius is mentioned as Ron's uncle who saw a Grim and died 24 hours later.
